message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the significant value it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $7,500. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire the product at a slight discount, making it an excellent investment for your business or personal use. I believe this offer will allow us to collaborate effectively while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
